name: Glacial Lance
description: You hurl a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance. Make a ranged attack, dealing 3d6 + MOVE ice damage on a hit. All other creatures within 5ft of the straight-line path between you and the target must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 2Ã—MOVE ice damage on failure.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
